CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 15, 1963, p. 15, reads: "The 1963 Courier-WAMO Home-A-Rama. Pittsburgh's only home and food show, opened before a huge throng last Thursday, June 6, at the spacious Syria Mosque in Oakland...  13. Jacquin's Cordials: John (Red) Mason, Andy (Kid) De Paul, district supervisor, Arnold (Ozzie) Manupelli, John Vorsino and Harry Waugh Sr., special representative from Philadelphia..."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of John "Red" Mason, Andy "Kid" DePaul, Arnold "Ozzie" Manupelli, John Vorsino, and Harry Waugh Sr., in Jacquin's Cordials booth, at 1963 Pittsburgh Courier - WAMO, Home-A-Rama fair, Syria Mosque
